Actions.description: The available actions for this resource.
Actions.longDescription: This type shall contain the available actions for this resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Oem.description: The available OEM-specific actions for this resource.
Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain the available OEM-specific actions for this resource.

Links.description: The links to other resources that are related to this resource.
Links.longDescription: This Redfish Specification-described type shall contain links to resources that are related to but are not contained by, or subordinate to, this resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

ElectricalBuses.description: An array of links to the electrical buses in this power domain.
ElectricalBuses.longDescription: This property shall contain an array of links to resources of type PowerDistribution that represent the electrical buses in this power domain.

FloorPDUs.description: An array of links to the floor power distribution units in this power domain.
FloorPDUs.longDescription: This property shall contain an array of links to resources of type PowerDistribution that represents the floor power distribution units in this power domain.

ManagedBy.description: An array of links to the managers responsible for managing this power domain.
ManagedBy.longDescription: This property shall contain an array of links to resources of type Manager that represent the managers that manage this power domain.

Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain the OEM extensions.  All values for properties contained in this object shall conform to the Redfish Specification-described requirements.

PowerShelves.description: An array of links to the power shelves in this power domain.
PowerShelves.longDescription: This property shall contain an array of links to resources of type PowerDistribution that represents the power shelves in this power domain.

RackPDUs.description: An array of links to the rack-level power distribution units in this power domain.
RackPDUs.longDescription: This property shall contain an array of links to resources of type PowerDistribution that represents the rack-level power distribution units in this power domain.

Switchgear.description: An array of links to the switchgear in this power domain.
Switchgear.longDescription: This property shall contain an array of links to resources of type PowerDistribution that represents the switchgear in this power domain.

TransferSwitches.description: An array of links to the transfer switches in this power domain.
TransferSwitches.longDescription: This property shall contain an array of links to resources of type PowerDistribution that represents the transfer switches in this power domain.

OemActions.description: The available OEM-specific actions for this resource.
OemActions.longDescription: This type shall contain the available OEM-specific actions for this resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

PowerDomain.description: The PowerDomain schema contains definition for the DCIM power domain.
PowerDomain.longDescription: This resource shall be used to represent a DCIM power domain for a Redfish implementation.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Actions.description: The available actions for this resource.
Actions.longDescription: This property shall contain the available actions for this resource.

Links.description: The links to other resources that are related to this resource.
Links.longDescription: This property shall contain links to resources that are related to but are not contained by, or subordinate to, this resource.

Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain the OEM extensions.  All values for properties that this object contains shall conform to the Redfish Specification-described requirements.

Status.description: The status and health of the resource and its subordinate or dependent resources.
Status.longDescription: This property shall contain any status or health properties of the resource.

title: #PowerDomain.v1_2_0.PowerDomain
